asteroids

Class Rock

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Polygon
      • asteroids.Rock
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.Shape, java.io.Serializable

    public class Rock
extends java.awt.Polygon
    The Rock class is a subclass of Polygon and holds the data and methods needed to draw and move the rocks. Each rock is drawn using a set of points held in two static arrays.
    Version:
    1.0.4
    Author:
    Casey Scarborough
    See Also:
    GameBoard, Serialized Form
